title: 紀錄片《香港画Montage of Hong Kong 》預告片連中文字幕現已推出!

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/hongkongga/videos/436330857370621

於電影節獲得壓倒性的支持,達成三冠!
由日本人導演所記錄，
憤慨與震盪的香港社會運動記憶
香港正朝著哪裡去?
Link : https://vimeo.com/ondemand/hongkongga

Achieved three crowns with overwhelming support at film festivals!
This movie was shot by a Japanese director.
Memories of rage and shock in Hong Kong.
Where is Hong Kong going?
Link : https://vimeo.com/ondemand/hongkongga

概略 / Synopsis
香港，曾經被稱為東方之珠的自由都市，於1997年被英國移交給中國。
現今，為了從中國的統治下解放，同時為了追求民主，
香港的每一吋土地皆被捲入一埸看不見盡頭，仍然一息尚存的抗爭。
這些年輕人到底為何而戰? 本作以各式各樣的形式追溯了與這埸運動有關聯的人的軌跡。

Hong Kong. A free city known as "The pearl of the Orient”
In 1997, Hong Kong was returned by the UK to China.
Now, to set free from the control by the China government,
endless protests continue throughout Hong Kong,
struggling for true democratization and liberation from the China government.
What are Hong Kong young people fighting for?
We interviewed people involved in the demonstration in various ways and followed their trajectory.

通知 / Info
網絡Online版包含了在國安法實施後於日本戰線活動的香港人的故事。
網絡Online版由2020年12月25日至2021年3月31日期間限定收費放送。

The online version is a special version that includes the story of Hongkongers protesting and fighting in Japan after the enforcement of the National Security Law.The online version's ticket will be open to the public for purchasing from December 25, 2020 to March 31, 2021.

※オンライン版は日本国内からはご覧いただけません。

https://www.facebook.com/hongkongga/posts/136719454895359
